poem:
**The Price of Healing**

In Mont-Saint-Guibert, dreams are purchased  
with a billion petals of promise,  
cells beckoning courage from the marrow  
of the earth. Yet, in this dance of currencies  
and hope, who holds the book  
of our fading verses? Beneath  
hospital fluorescents, the soft chant of healing  
is measured in whispers:  
a gift we cannot touch.
